title: Ornament kit

properties.name: description
properties.value: Ornament kits are items that are used on certain items to change their appearance. This change is usually cosmetic and makes it untradeable, this also means that the ornamented item will be protected upon death outside of the wilderness (and pvp worlds) in addition to the standard 3 items kept on death.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Ornament kit
"Kit" redirects here. For other uses, see Kit (disambiguation).

Ornament kits are items that are used on certain items to change their appearance. This change is usually cosmetic and makes it untradeable, this also means that the ornamented item will be protected upon death outside of the wilderness (and pvp worlds) in addition to the standard 3 items kept on death.

Some are obtainable by completing beginner, hard, elite or master tier Treasure Trails, but unlike most Treasure Trail items, these are not storable at a Player-owned house. In addition, ornament kits obtained from a Treasure Trail allow the player to revert their ornamented item and retain the kit, which isn't the case for the kits purchased from the Bounty Hunter Shop.
